screen_example.title: Welcome on The $t(common_appName.full)
screen_example.description: Do you want to discover some features? Just click on one of the three buttons at the bottom of the screen. The first allows you to call a REST API. The second lets you change the theme color. And the third allows you to change the language.

error_boundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
error_boundary.description: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again later.

openchord.you_havent_created_any_playlist_yet: You haven't created any playlist yet
openchord.you_havent_downloaded_any_song_yet: You haven't downloaded any song yet
openchord.you_havent_added_any_song_to_this_playli: You haven't added any song to this playlist yet
openchord.create_backup_description: Pack all songs and playlists into a .openchord file
openchord.share_message: Download OpenChord app, go to Settings > Import and select this file
openchord.permission_message: Open Chord App needs access to your storage so you can save your backups.
openchord.online_search_not_available: Sorry, ONLINE SEARCH is not available for IOS yet
openchord.you_can_still_create_songs_manually: You can still create songs manually
